I just want to say thanks for your generosity.  I really just can't imagine how fast you can get Bluray version of the movie! You are awesome! If this is a race, you are always the first to arrive!

@Rookzy: no, the subs are not always there. only during the none English parts of the movie are they present so you know what they're saying. it sounds like that's how it's supposed to be anyways.
